description: Try our easy to follow Baked Camembert With Rosemary & Walnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Camembert With Rosemary & Walnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup honey, plus extra to serve
0.25 cup whole walnuts, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Line a small cast-iron dish or pizza tray with foil, then 2 layers of baking paper, allowing plenty of overhang. Place camembert on baking paper. Top with figs, honey, walnuts, vinegar, rosemary and peel.
Bring up sides of foil and paper to form a loose parcel, partially folding edges to seal. Place dish or tray on barbecue and cover with lid. Cook for 10 minutes or until cheese is oozy.
Holding onto baking paper, lift baked cheese onto a serving plate. Drizzle over extra honey and serve with extra walnuts and sourdough.
